General.Name: Dacome International Ltd
General.Description: Dacome International Ltd. distributes golf brands in Taiwan, the United States, and Japan. The company offers balls, golf products, footwear, bags, apparel, caps, belts, gloves, accessories, team gifts, and gift certificates, as well as training supplies. It also markets its products through its website, golfshop.com.tw; and provides golf equipment bidding, discounted golf course reservations, golf tours at home and abroad, golf skills teaching, handicap systems, etc. Dacome International Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.
